title: 2021's Biggest Stories, Manchin on BBB, Opioid Legislation
itunes:title: 2021's Biggest Stories, Manchin on BBB, Opioid Legislation
description:
Bloomberg Government's Emily Wilkins and Jack Fitzpatrick hosted the show. Guests: Representative Madeleine Dean of Pennsylvania, West Virginia Democratic Strategist Mike Plante, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
